folder.name: dp-203/02-Serverless SQL/03-Lab-Transform files using a serverless SQL pool

content.query:
-- Lab: Transform files using a serverless SQL pool
-- Task: Query Sales CSV files

-- This code uses the OPENROWSET to read data from the CSV files in the sales folder and retrieves the first 100 rows of data.
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakevipaiva.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-203/03/data/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- In this case, the data files include the column names in the first row; so modify the query to add a HEADER_ROW = TRUE parameter to the WITH clause, as shown here 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakevipaiva.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-203/03/data/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
